issue.title: [CF 871] Hide Text Displays in Config
issue.body:
I may have asked you about this once and you said this isn't possible, but I forget.

http://i.imgur.com/j6Na682.jpg

Was wondering if you could make an option to make Text Displays (see the top left of image) not show up while in the /tmw config mode. Looks a bit gaudy and depending how big you set the text layout's text to, probably covers up other nearby auras, which could be a bit annoying.


> Posted by CurseForge user Freeebo | Imported from CurseForge issue #871 | Raw

comments.body:
No, there are no plans for this.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
